channel.title: home on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in home on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: LOG 1.24: Coming home :)
item.description: 5th August, 2011 This time next week, I will be home. I can’t tell you how excited I am! When I was translating a song which talked about Idlys in one line, /2011/07/29/balailakka-balailakka-lyrics-and-translation-with-end-notes/ I looked them up to share an image link for those readers who don’t know what it is.

item.title: Vidai Kodu Engal Nade: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: This song is from Kannathil Muththam Ittal. It is a touching story about little girl who tries to find her biological mother after finding out she was adopted.

item.title: Insanity?
item.description: From May 2008 How intensely have you questioned your sanity? Today my brain perceived differently- I saw at angles I hadn’t seen before and heard at times I couldn’t explain.

item.title: Missing Mountains
item.description: First published in September 2007 . This prison. Walls. No trees. No where to hide To be alone or cry. No one to understand the lover’s yearning for the mountains

item.title: Understanding India using Europe
item.description: It is too difficult for a European to see India as one country when they understand it’s diversity is more at the scale of a continent – their continent.
